properties.title: Skill Area Laax Bergbahnen
properties.abstract: The skill area with a pump track is located at the Laax Murschteg cableways. It is the perfect place for you to hone and learn skills.
properties.description:
The skill area consists of a trail with a root and stone area, seesaws, hairpin bends, drops of varying heights (15, 30, 60cm), a narrow plank (15cm) as well as a short pump track. After warming up at the skill area, take the cablecar to get to the Never End trail â€“ the perfect place to put everything you practiced to the test.

Length: 80m / surface: gravel.
properties.name: Flims Laax Falera
